name: BF03
statement: SELECT VALUE u FROM `GleambookUsers` u WHERE u.user_since >= "2001-01-01T00:00:00" AND u.user_since < "2001-09-25T19:28:00";

name: BF04
statement: SELECT VALUE u FROM `GleambookUsers` u WHERE u.user_since >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND u.user_since < "2000-12-04T01:10:00" AND (SOME e IN u.employment SATISFIES e.end_date IS UNKNOWN);

name: BF08
statement: SELECT cm.user.screen_name AS username, AVG(LENGTH(cm.message_text)) AS avg FROM `ChirpMessages` cm WHERE cm.send_time >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND cm.send_time < "2000-01-27T17:54:02" GROUP BY cm.user.screen_name ORDER BY avg LIMIT 10;

name: BF14
description: Select join with grouping aggregation (1M matches)
statement: SELECT META(u).id AS id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM `GleambookUsers` u, `GleambookMessages` m WHERE TO_STRING(META(u).id) = m.author_id AND u.user_since >= "2001-01-01T00:00:00" AND u.user_since < "2001-09-25T19:28:00" AND m.send_time >= "2002-01-01T00:00:00" AND m.send_time < "2002-02-23T12:00:00" GROUP BY META(u).id;

name: BF15
statement: SELECT META(u).id AS id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM `GleambookUsers` u, `GleambookMessages` m WHERE TO_STRING(META(u).id) = m.author_id AND u.user_since >= "2001-01-01T00:00:00" AND u.user_since < "2001-09-25T19:28:00" AND m.send_time >= "2002-01-01T00:00:00" AND m.send_time < "2002-02-23T12:00:00" GROUP BY META(u).id ORDER BY count LIMIT 10;
